original_text: Therefore have I also made you contemptible and base before all the people, according as ye have not kept my ways, but have been partial in the law.
korean_text: 너희가 내 길을 지키지 아니하고 율법을 행할 때에 사람에게 치우치게 하였으므로 나도 너희로 하여금 모든 백성 앞에서 멸시와 천대를 당하게 하였느니라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: Therefore have I also made you contemptible and base
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 내가 또한 너희를 경멸받고 비천하게 만들었다

sentences.original_text: according as ye have not kept my ways
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 내 길을 지키지 않았기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: but have been partial in the law
